dcterms:creator: B. Strickson
B. D. L. Iglesia
dcterms:description: A dataset containing approximately 5,000 labeled UK court judgments, gathered from the web, used for the task of legal judgment prediction.
dcterms:title: UK Court Judgments

dcterms:creator: I. Chalkidis
I. Androutsopoulos
N. Aletras
dcterms:description: A dataset containing allegations of violated provisions regarding the European Convention of Human Rights, with each case including a list of facts and a score representing the importance of the case.
dcterms:title: ECHR Cases

dcterms:creator: I. Chalkidis
M. Wrzalik
D. Krechel
dcterms:description: A dataset for legal precedent retrieval based on case laws gathered from Open Legal Data, where passages containing references are considered queries and the referenced law cases are labeled as relevant.
dcterms:title: GerDaLIR

dcterms:creator: J. Niklaus
I. Chalkidis
M. Stürmer
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 85,000 cases from the Federal Supreme Court of Switzerland, annotated with publication years, legal areas, and cantons of origin, used for binary classification of judgment outcomes.
dcterms:title: Federal Supreme Court of Switzerland Cases

dcterms:creator: V. R. Walker
K. Pillaipakkamnatt
A. M. Davidson
M. Linares
D. J. Pesce
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 50 fact-finding decisions of the US Board of Veterans’ Appeals, where each sentence is assigned a rhetorical role by domain experts.
dcterms:title: US Board of Veterans’ Appeals Cases

dcterms:creator: Z. Shen
K. Lo
L. Yu
N. Dahlberg
M. Schlanger
D. Downey
dcterms:description: A collection of almost 9,000 expert-edited abstractive summaries for 40,000 writings of the Civil Rights Litigation Clearinghouse, designed for multi-document and single-document summarization tasks.
dcterms:title: Civil Rights Litigation Clearinghouse

dcterms:creator: C. Xiao
H. Zhong
Z. Guo
C. Tu
Z. Liu
M. Sun
dcterms:description: A dataset of about 8,000 triplets of cases from the Supreme People’s Court of China, concerning private lending, used for similar case matching in the legal domain.
dcterms:title: CAIL2019-SCM

dcterms:creator: D. Hendrycks
C. Burns
A. Chen
S. Ball
dcterms:description: An expert-annotated NLP dataset for legal contract review, containing over 500 contracts with 13,000 annotations across 41 category labels provided by legal experts.
dcterms:title: CUAD

dcterms:creator: I. Chalkidis
M. Fergadiotis
P. Malakasiotis
N. Aletras
I. Androutsopoulos
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for legal language understanding in English, consisting of multiple existing legal NLP datasets for evaluating models across several legal tasks.
dcterms:title: LexGLUE
